text: “Uye musave munoswedera pedyo nehupfumi hwenherera, kusara kwekuti muchida kuhuwedzera mune zvakanaka, kusvika abva zera; uye zadzikisai chikero mova munoera mune zvakanaka. Hatipi munhu mutoro kusara kwewaanokwanisa kutakura. Uye kana muchitaura muchiyananisa, taurai chokwadi kunyangwe iri hama yepedyo; uye zadzikisai chibvumirano chaAllah. Izvi (Allah) vanokukomekedzai kuti zvimwe mungarangarire.”
